title: kunru kaNDAl
sahitya:
kunru kaNDAl Eri ninru koNDOnai senru kaNDoukku kSEmam uNDAgumE


anupallavi

  inrum enrum avan iNaiyaDi onrinaiyE Etra tuNaiyAgumenru pOTrip-paNivOmE


caraNam    aDiyArkkaruLum koDaik-karamuDaiyavan iDaravar paDuvadai tuDaittu viDubavan
paDiyidanil tanadu padam paNindiDuvOrai kaDait-tETri viDum karuNaikkaDal avan
